00016 package pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions.lazy;

00018 import com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap;
00019 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.BitmapDescriptor;
00020 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng;
00021 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker;
00022 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.MarkerOptions;
00023 
00024 public class LazyMarker {
00025 
00026         public interface OnMarkerCreateListener {
00027 
00028                 void onMarkerCreate(LazyMarker marker);
00029         }
00030 
00031         private Marker marker;
00032         private GoogleMap map;
00033         private MarkerOptions markerOptions;
00034         private OnMarkerCreateListener listener;
00035 
00036         public LazyMarker(GoogleMap map, MarkerOptions options) {
00037                 this(map, options, null);
00038         }
00039 
00040         public LazyMarker(GoogleMap map, MarkerOptions options, OnMarkerCreateListener listener) {
00041                 if (options.isVisible()) {
00042                         createMarker(map, options, listener);
00043                 } else {
00044                         this.map = map;
00045                         this.markerOptions = copy(options);
00046                         this.listener = listener;
00047                 }
00048         }
00049 
00050         @Deprecated
00051         public String getId() {
00052                 createMarker();
00053                 return marker.getId();
00054         }
00055 
00056         public Marker getMarker() {
00057                 return marker;
00058         }
00059 
00060         public LatLng getPosition() {
00061                 if (marker != null) {
00062                         return marker.getPosition();
00063                 } else {
00064                         return markerOptions.getPosition();
00065                 }
00066         }
00067 
00068         public String getSnippet() {
00069                 if (marker != null) {
00070                         return marker.getSnippet();
00071                 } else {
00072                         return markerOptions.getSnippet();
00073                 }
00074         }
00075 
00076         public String getTitle() {
00077                 if (marker != null) {
00078                         return marker.getTitle();
00079                 } else {
00080                         return markerOptions.getTitle();
00081                 }
00082         }
00083 
00084         public void hideInfoWindow() {
00085                 if (marker != null) {
00086                         marker.hideInfoWindow();
00087                 }
00088         }
00089 
00090         public boolean isDraggable() {
00091                 if (marker != null) {
00092                         return marker.isDraggable();
00093                 } else {
00094                         return markerOptions.isDraggable();
00095                 }
00096         }
00097 
00098         public boolean isInfoWindowShown() {
00099                 if (marker != null) {
00100                         return marker.isInfoWindowShown();
00101                 } else {
00102                         return false;
00103                 }
00104         }
00105 
00106         public boolean isVisible() {
00107                 if (marker != null) {
00108                         return marker.isVisible();
00109                 } else {
00110                         return false;
00111                 }
00112         }
00113 
00114         public void remove() {
00115                 if (marker != null) {
00116                         marker.remove();
00117                         marker = null;
00118                 } else {
00119                         map = null;
00120                         markerOptions = null;
00121                         listener = null;
00122                 }
00123         }
00124 
00125         public void setAnchor(float anchorU, float anchorV) {
00126                 if (marker != null) {
00127                         marker.setAnchor(anchorU, anchorV);
00128                 } else {
00129                         markerOptions.anchor(anchorU, anchorV);
00130                 }
00131         }
00132 
00133         public void setDraggable(boolean draggable) {
00134                 if (marker != null) {
00135                         marker.setDraggable(draggable);
00136                 } else {
00137                         markerOptions.draggable(draggable);
00138                 }
00139         }
00140 
00141         public void setIcon(BitmapDescriptor icon) {
00142                 if (marker != null) {
00143                         marker.setIcon(icon);
00144                 } else {
00145                         markerOptions.icon(icon);
00146                 }
00147         }
00148 
00149         public void setPosition(LatLng position) {
00150                 if (marker != null) {
00151                         marker.setPosition(position);
00152                 } else {
00153                         markerOptions.position(position);
00154                 }
00155         }
00156 
00157         public void setSnippet(String snippet) {
00158                 if (marker != null) {
00159                         marker.setSnippet(snippet);
00160                 } else {
00161                         markerOptions.snippet(snippet);
00162                 }
00163         }
00164 
00165         public void setTitle(String title) {
00166                 if (marker != null) {
00167                         marker.setTitle(title);
00168                 } else {
00169                         markerOptions.title(title);
00170                 }
00171         }
00172 
00173         public void setVisible(boolean visible) {
00174                 if (marker != null) {
00175                         marker.setVisible(visible);
00176                 } else if (visible) {
00177                         markerOptions.visible(true);
00178                         createMarker();
00179                 }
00180         }
00181 
00182         public void showInfoWindow() {
00183                 if (marker != null) {
00184                         marker.showInfoWindow();
00185                 }
00186         }
00187 
00188         private void createMarker() {
00189                 if (marker == null) {
00190                         createMarker(map, markerOptions, listener);
00191                         map = null;
00192                         markerOptions = null;
00193                         listener = null;
00194                 }
00195         }
00196 
00197         private void createMarker(GoogleMap map, MarkerOptions options, OnMarkerCreateListener listener) {
00198                 marker = map.addMarker(options);
00199                 if (listener != null) {
00200                         listener.onMarkerCreate(this);
00201                 }
00202         }
00203 
00204         private MarkerOptions copy(MarkerOptions options) {
00205                 MarkerOptions copy = new MarkerOptions();
00206                 copy.anchor(options.getAnchorU(), options.getAnchorV());
00207                 copy.draggable(options.isDraggable());
00208                 copy.icon(options.getIcon());
00209                 copy.position(options.getPosition());
00210                 copy.snippet(options.getSnippet());
00211                 copy.title(options.getTitle());
00212                 copy.visible(options.isVisible());
00213                 return copy;
00214         }
00215 }
